summary: AN ORDINANCE authorizing, in 2008, acceptance of funding from non-City sources; authorizing the heads of Department of Parks and Recreation, the Human Services Department, the Legislative Department, the Office of Housing, the Office of Sustainability and Environment, Seattle City Light, the Seattle Department of Transportation, the Seattle Fire Department, the Seattle Police Department, and Seattle Public Utilities, to accept specified grants and public and private funding, and to execute, deliver, and perform corresponding agreements.
